tool_description: Scans text for profane language, inappropriate sexual content, and vulgar expressions with customizable filtering levels.

text_content.description: Text content to scan for profanity

detect_masked_profanity.description: Whether to detect masked or obfuscated profanity

error_messages: Empty text content: Provide non-empty text for profanity scanning.
Invalid filter level: Use strict, moderate, or lenient.
Text processing error: Unable to process text due to encoding issues.
usage: Input text_content for scanning. Choose appropriate filter_level based on audience. Enable detect_masked_profanity to catch obfuscated terms.
